pkgmetadata.longdescription: MovieBot Python API====================.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/movie-bot-api.svg :target: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/movie-bot-api.svg :alt: PyPI version info.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/movie-bot-api.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/movie-bot-api :alt: PyPI supported Python versions易于使用的，灵活的，可扩展的，Movie Bot智能影音机器人官方Python API包装器安装-------------使用pip安装:.. code:: sh # Linux/macOS python3 -m pip install -U movie-bot-api # Windows py -3 -m pip install -U movie-bot-api
